channel.title: Northumberland on North of Tyne LPC
channel.description: Recent content in Northumberland on North of Tyne LPC

item.title: Northumberland Locality HLP Meeting
item.description: Date: Wednesday 18th September 2019 Time: 10.00 – 12.00 Location: - Choppington Social Welfare Centre, NE62 5SS Registration: - Refreshments: - Costs for tea and coffee will be covered by the LPC Notes: This meeting is for all Northumberland community pharmacies accredited as Healthy Living Pharmacies (HLP) or working towards HLP accreditation. This meeting is open to those staff who will be or are currently training to be Health Champions.

item.title: Northumberland Locality HLP Meeting
item.description: Date: Wednesday 19th September 2018 Time: 10.00 – 12.00 Location: - Choppington Social Welfare Centre, NE62 5SS Registration: - Register Online Refreshments: - Costs for tea and coffee will be covered by the LPC Notes: The next Northumberland Health Champion meeting will take place on Wednesday 19th September at 10am and as usual, at Choppington Social Welfare Centre. We are very pleased to have Kate Whitehead from Northumberland Carers coming to speak to you.
